questions.a: As a freelance developer, my working hours may vary, but my hours of communication will always be 9am-5pm CST.

questions.q: What are all of your services?
questions.a: My services range so here's a list: consultation, logo or website design, full-stack development, SEO, performance optimization, continuous integration, deployments.

questions.q: Are you currently available for work?
questions.a: Yes, I am available for part-time, full-time, and contract work. If you'd like to hire me, waste no time at all and fill out the contact form!
You can ask your question in the form and I will either contact you, add your question to the faq, or both.
